item.title: golang http client 缓存问题
item.description: golang内置的http客户端默认会缓存tcp连接, 官方文档也说到了这个需要注意的地方: A Client is an HTTP client. Its zero value (DefaultClient) is a usable client that uses DefaultTransport. The Client’s Transport typically has internal state (cached
